content: The BBC will put up as many of your comments as possible but we cannot guarantee that all e-mails will be published. The BBC reserves the right to edit comments that are published.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div div table tbody tr td div font span
content: One by U2 is the most stunning and beautiful tunes. It has melancholy lyrics that are powerfully hopefull, mournfull, deeply personal, and touching. The music emotes and soars and lifts your heart up while breaking it.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div div font span

content: This is one of the greatest and most moving songs ever written. No matter how often you hear it, it never fails to affect you with its lyrics and deep emotion. A masterpiece.

content: One song, one album, one band. What a song, what a band, what an album. I am hope the repetion of my comment does not bore you. I thought it was a intresting way to put the point.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div div font p span span

content: "One" has to be U2's best song. I have been a U2 fan since 1991. Achtung Baby was my first U2 album. I have been hooked ever since. Every time you listen to this song, it sends shivers down your spine.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div div font p span span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div div font p span span
content: I love this one very much. It belongs up there with R.E.M's "Everybody Hurts" as being a beautiful yet tearjerking classic. And Johnny Cash's version was superb too.

content: Not a die hard U2 fan but this is lyrically one of the best. Jonny Cash cover is spellbinding, heartbreaking almost especially 'did i ask to much, more than a lot, you gave me nothing now it's all I got.'

content: "One" is a great U2 anthem with all the trademark inspirational lyrics and layers of sound you've come to expect from this band. U2 don't just tell a story, they create a soundscape which in this case is poignant but ultimately uplifting - a celebration of unity in diversity.

content: I am actually listening this show from down here in Chile and is awesome how this song bring tears to your eyes the very moment it starts, WOW!

content: Mr Jonny Cash covered this epic song with his magical acoustic twist, long live the ONE
